<h1 align="center">
  Gatsby's Hotel App
</h1>

## 🚀 Quick start

**Start developing**

Install dependences

```shell
yarn install
```

Start in development nmode

```shell
yarn start
```

**Build the app for production**

```shell
yarn build
```
